thread.title: Easton's Diana Hammerstone is the LVL Girls Cross Country Athlete of the Week
thread.title_full: Easton's Diana Hammerstone is the LVL Girls Cross Country Athlete of the Week

title: Easton's Diana Hammerstone is the LVL Girls Cross Country Athlete of the Week
text:
The Red Rovers senior captain led her team to a 15-50 shutout of host Phillipsburg in the rivalry dual meet Saturday morning at the Phillipsburg Athletic Complex. 
Hammerstone finished first overall in 20 minutes and 2 seconds. 
Honorable mention: So. Sophie Doman , Palisades; Fr. Lauren Maddison , Easton; Jr. Abby Rustay, Wilson; So. Molly Tarvin , Northwestern Lehigh; Jr. Alyssa VandeBunte , Southern Lehigh; Fr. Lauren Wagner , Voorhees. 
Brad Wilson may be reached at bwilson@lehighvalleylive.com . Follow him on Twitter @bradwsports . Find Lehigh Valley high school sports on Facebook .
